verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> refrain <S%H662>himself<s%> before <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H5324>stood<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> him; and he <S%H7121>cried,<s%> Cause <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me. And there <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, while <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made himself <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>
And he wept <S%H5414>aloud:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6963><s%> <S%H1065><s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H3130>Joseph;<s%> doth my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>live?<s%> And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> him; <S%H3588>for<s%> they were <S%H926>troubled<s%> at his <S%H4480>presence.<s%> <S%H6440><s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> Come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>you.<s%> And they came <S%H5066>near.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> ye <S%H4376>sold<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H6087>grieved,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> with <S%H5869>yourselves,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye <S%H4376>sold<s%> me <S%H2008>hither:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> did <S%H7971>send<s%> me <S%H6440>before<s%> you to preserve <S%H4241>life.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> two <S%H8141>years<s%> hath the <S%H7458>famine<s%> been <S%H7130>in<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H5750>yet<s%> there are <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> in the <S%H834>which<s%> there shall <S%H369>neither<s%> be <S%H2758>earing<s%> nor <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H7760>preserve<s%> you a <S%H7611>posterity<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and to save your <S%H2421>lives<s%> by a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6413>deliverance.<s%>

So <S%H6258>now<s%> it was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H859>you<s%> that <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H2008>hither,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%> and he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> me a <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H113>lord<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and a <S%H4910>ruler<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Haste <S%H4116><s%> ye, and go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7760>made<s%> me <S%H113>lord<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H5975>tarry<s%> not: <S%H408><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>children,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and thy <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and thy <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast:

And <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H3557>nourish<s%> thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> there are <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast, come to <S%H3423>poverty.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> it is my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you.

And ye shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye have <S%H7200>seen;<s%> and ye shall <S%H4116>haste<s%> and bring <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2008>hither.<s%>

And he <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept;<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H6677>neck.<s%>

Moreover he <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them: and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.

And the <S%H6963>fame<s%> thereof was <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> are <S%H935>come:<s%> and it pleased Pharaoh <S%H3190>well,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H6547><s%> and his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> ye; <S%H2943>lade<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1165>beasts,<s%> and <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H935>get<s%> you unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%>

And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H1004>households,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me: and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> ye; <S%H3947>take<s%> you <S%H5699>wagons<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and for your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H935>come.<s%>
Also <S%H5869>regard<s%> <S%H2347><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> your <S%H3627>stuff;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is yours.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H5699>wagons,<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H6720>provision<s%> for the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

To <S%H3605>all<s%> of them he <S%H5414>gave<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H8071>raiment;<s%> but to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H8071>raiment.<s%>

And to his <S%H1>father<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> after <S%H2063>this<s%> manner; <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H5375>laden<s%> with the good <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H2898><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> she <S%H860>asses<s%> <S%H5375>laden<s%> with <S%H1250>corn<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4202>meat<s%> for his <S%H1>father<s%> by the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> away, and they <S%H1980>departed:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, See that ye fall not <S%H7264>out<s%> <S%H408><s%> by the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And they went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%>

And <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H4910>governor<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> And Jacob's <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6313>fainted,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H539>believed<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And they <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them: and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> him, the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> revived: <S%H2421><s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H7227>enough;<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive:<s%> I will <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> him <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H4191>die.<s%>
